descriptionHtml:
-------------------------------------A RINKU95 MOD----------------------------------------------

Do your experience on Skyrim more interesting if you are a werewolf.With this mod, you can turn in to a werewolf radomly like when you are wearing the cursed ring of Hircine.

You can find the new ring in a chest on Riverwood.

How to install :

Extract the content in to the data folder or use the nexus mod manager


REPORT ANY BUG PLEASE
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
author: Rinku95
